abstract: Hungarian prosecutors charge camerawoman Petra Laszlo, working for far right news outlet at time, with breach of peace, year after she was captured on video kicking and trying to trip up migrants near Hungary-Serbia border.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Petra Laszlo was thought to have kicked a Syrian father who was holding his child, although prosecutors said her actions had not been motivated by bias or racism.
snippet: Petra Laszlo was thought to have kicked a Syrian father who was holding his child, although prosecutors said her actions had not been motivated by bias or racism....

headline.main: Camerawoman Who Kicked Refugees in Hungary Is Charged With ‘Breach of Peace’
headline.print_headline: Woman Who Kicked Refugees Is Charged
